alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Worcester, eastern Hampshire and east central Hampden Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Brookfield, or 19 miles west of Worcester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Leominster, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Hudson, Westborough, Holden, Northborough, Clinton, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester, Ware, Southborough, Lancaster, Rutland, Sterling, West Boylston, Harvard and Warren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western, central and northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
